official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to make changes in the judicial divisions in the Southern District of Georgia.

summary.text: Changes the composition of the Savannah and Statesboro Divisions of the district court for the Southern District of Georgia. Moves Evans, Screven, and Tattnall Counties from the Savannah Division to the Statesboro Division.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to make changes in the judicial divisions in the Southern District of Georgia.
